HomePage.goalsDesc: Today, Capital-T is a modern, dynamically developing company with strong potential and long-term prospects.

HomePage.title: News

intro.title: Leading trading and distribution company
intro.p1: CAPITAL-T is one of the largest distribution companies in the Republic of Tajikistan, engaged in wholesale trade and distribution of food products, perfumes and cosmetics, hygiene products, and more.
intro.p2: Since 2000, CAPITAL-T LLC has been developing dynamically, establishing new partnerships, expanding its client base, improving infrastructure, and enhancing software solutions.
intro.p3: The company continuously works on expanding its sales geography to cover remote and hard-to-reach regions of the country.
